file_content.text: Attack group, this is Havoc. Objective complete. All ships, evacuate to minimum safe distance!
We copy, Havoc. All ships are clear. Proceed with the detonation.
Boom.
Target destroyed. Repeat, the Gauntlet has been destroyed!
All ships, disengage and proceed to rendezvous four-seven for refueling. Havoc, return to General Garza on Coruscant for debrief.
I'll proceed to Coruscant immediately, Admiral.
Understood.
We've worked a long time to make this happen.
Hard to believe it's over.
All of our work was worth it.
Forget the debriefing, we need a victory celebration!
I'm having a party first!
I will pretend I didn't hear that.
The Empire's greatest weapon has been destroyed. Congratulations, Havoc. Numinn out.
Havoc, this is Admiral Numinn. Our attack group has exited hyperspace and engaged the Imperials' escort ships. Defensive forces are as expected.
Lieutenant Coria reports that the Safecrackers have breached the planetary shield generator--you are clear to make your run on the Gauntlet. Good hunting.
Give the Imperials a run for their money, sir.
Same to you.
We'll be in contact if anything develops. Numinn out.
Don't get so caught up blasting the Imps that you leave without me.
Have fun!
That won't be an issue. Numinn out.
This battle is a long way from over, sir. Be ready for anything.
Don't let your guard down yet.
Your advice on naval tactics is noted. Numinn out.
I've got the team prepped and ready for your assignments, Captain. We're all eager to do some damage.
Like Garza said, we'll need two for the assault on the bridge. Getting in there will be a fight.
Vik and Yuun are spoken for, so that leaves me, Dorne and Forex to hit the bridge. Who do you want on the job?
Take Sergeant Dorne and get that bridge cleared out.
You and Dorne are in.
I want to send as much firepower at the bridge as possible. Forex will back you up.
For this, it's you and Forex.
Sergeant Dorne knows the Imperials' systems, and Forex can take the heat.
I want Dorne and Forex.
Captain, sir--the squad is assembled and ready to receive your battle assignments.
Our operation orders require two squad members to assault the bridge and collect data there. Resistance will be heavy.
As Specialist Vik and Sergeant Yuun already have assignments, available personnel for the bridge assault are myself, Sergeant Jorgan and M1-4X. Who do you want to send, sir?
Take Sergeant Jorgan and show me what you've got.
You and Jorgan are in.
We'll get the job done.
It's an honor. Thank you, sir.
Forex can cover you while you get that data, Lieutenant.
For this, it's you and Forex.
All bridge data will be collected and returned without error, sir.
No Imperial will stand in our way! The Republic will triumph!
I want maximum firepower on the bridge assault--that means Forex and Jorgan.
I want Jorgan and Forex.
Works for me. We'll clear the place out, huh, Forex?
Affirmative, Lieutenant, sir! No Imperial will remain standing in the wake of our heroic assault!
We'll make the final adjustments before we land. Any other words for the team?
I'll see to our final preparations, sir. Any further words for the squad?
Havoc is the best squad in the Republic because it has the best soldiers in the Republic. That is why we'll succeed.
I know I can count on you all.
We may be charging headfirst into the most advanced weapon of war the Sith Empire has ever built, but we will succeed.
The odds may be impossible. The enemy may outnumber us ten to one. But Havoc Squad will succeed!
You're all supposed to be the best in the Republic. Now prove it!
No room for mistakes on this!
This op will be flawless--no surprises, no screwups, no "improvisations" without orders. Do I make myself clear?
All of you know the mission and the stakes. We'll do this right, and then we go home, understood?
You don't need a speech.
Sir, yes, sir!
Sir, yes, sir!
